content: this is a legal case about a property dispute between two parties mo and čm they were coowners of a house courtyard the court decided to dissolve the coownership and sell the property through a public auction the money from the sale will be divided between the parties based on their coownership shares the court determined that physically dividing the property was possible but since the parties couldnt agree on a payment the property will be sold the market value of the property is 47820000 kuna the petitioner offered to pay 22000000 kuna for the counterpartys share but the counterparty objected the court ruled in favor of the petitioner and ordered the counterparty to reimburse 12 of the material costs the costs of the proceedings were decided based on the coownership shares
